categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: This Imperial officer was a commander on the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Devastator prior to the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY.
The Imperial officer briefed Darth Vader on various operation against the Rebel Alliance around the time of Operation Skyhook and the Battle of Hoth up to the Battle of Yavin

This officer appears in the cutscenes of Star Wars: Rebel Assault and informs Vader (who is always depicted in his Meditation chamber) on the progress of the game. Some of the lines exchanged between him and Vader are taken from the movies although in the original dialogues, Vader was in another location and addressed other officers.
The Imperial officer addresses Vader in the following occasions:
The officer's face is composited from footage of LucasArts artist Sean Turner, superimposed over footage from the original trilogy.
